analyzed: kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod de /

analyzed: kho bos bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa dag yod de /

analyzed: su la rag las brtags na /

analyzed: ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na /

analyzed: zhes skyon brtags so //

analyzed: zhes kun tu sgra grags pa dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni /

analyzed: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsam pa /
